items.heading: ZincObserve Features
items.title: ZincObserve is Built for Full - Text Search
items.desc: ZincObserve is a search engine that can be used for text data, logs, metrics, events, and more. It allows you to do a full-text search, among other things, including sending server logs to ZincObserve, pushing your application data, providing a full-text search, or building a search bar in your application.

content.title: ZincObserve Features
content.subtitle: It provides a host of features that help you get up and running in minutes.

items.title: Full Text Search
items.desc: You can index large amounts of text Zinc and search instantly. Zinc is a batteries-included setup. Embedded UI provides an easy way to get started and interact with your data.

items.title: Full Text Search
items.desc: Zinc is a batteries-included setup. Embedded UI provides an easy way to get started and interact with your data. No need to set up a separate GUI like Kibana.
